name: pliability Run to Hawaii Challenge
description: Complete 80K in June to earn free pliability—and a shot at racing in Hawaii!
reward: Complete 80K in June to earn a free month of pliability, plus a chance to win a trip to race in Hawaii!

name: Huawei: Fit 4 More Miles
description: Track 4 Active Hours &amp; Enjoy 15% Off All Huawei Wearables and Audio!
task: Record 4 hours of any activity you like
reward: Track 4 Active Hours \u0026 Enjoy 15% Off All Huawei Wearables and Audio!

name: Montane 30km for Your Mind
description: Log 30km to earn 20% off plus the chance to win £1000 worth of Montane kit
reward: Complete the challenge to earn a 20% discount, plus a chance to win £1000 of Montane kit

name: Columbia Hike Society Seek New Views
description: Join the Columbia Hike Society as we explore, connect, and Seek New Views.
reward: Complete the Columbia Hike Society challenge, earn your digital badge and a 10% discount on your first order.

name: SCHEELS Ride With Us
description: Ride 100 miles in 3 weeks for a chance to win a $1,000 SCHEELS gift card!
task: Complete a total of 100 miles within 3 weeks
reward: Ride 100 miles in 3 weeks for a chance to win a $1,000 SCHEELS gift card!

name: Challenge VITTEL® x STRAVA
description: Ride 172km in 6 weeks to revitalise yourself from head to toe with VITTEL®.
reward: Unlock a new badge and have a chance to win, among other things, a VIP experience at the Tour de France.

name: The Runna Stay Consistent Challenge
description: Stay Active this spring &amp; Get Runna Rewards!
reward: Grab a 2 week trial*, £15/$20 off merch \u0026 gift cards AND 1 entry into our EXCLUSIVE Runna giveaway!

name: Forestry England Forest Runner 5k
description: Run 5K for a chance to win epic prizes
reward: Complete the challenge for a chance to win a fantastic prize bundle and earn the Forest Runner 5k badge

name: Red Bull FROM 0 TO 400
description: Climb 1,200 metres of altitude in 3 weeks
reward: Join now, collect altitude metres and secure the chance to win extra wiiings!

name: June 5K x Brooks Challenge
description: From first attempts to PRs, chase your best 5K run with Brooks.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June 10K Challenge
description: Lace 'em up and show us what you've got.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Half Marathon Challenge
description: Race day or training day – all that matters is that you run long.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Run 100K Challenge
description: One month. 100 kilometers. You in?
task: Run a total of 100 km (62.1 mi) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Run 300K Challenge
description: One month. 300 kilometers. You in?
task: Run a total of 300 km (186.4 mi) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Elevation Challenge
description: Push yourself to the vertical limit with this quad-busting challenge.
task: Climb a total of 2,000 m (6,561.7 ft) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Gran Fondo Challenge
description: Take on our longest one-shot cycling challenge.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Ride 200K Challenge
description: One month. 200 km. You in?
task: Bike a total of 200 km (124.3 mi) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Ride 800K Challenge
description: Take on our longest cycling distance challenge.
task: Bike a total of 800 km (497.1 mi) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Cycling Elevation Challenge
description: Push yourself to the vertical limit with this quad-busting challenge.
task: Climb a total of 7,000 m (22,965.9 ft) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Walk 50K Challenge
description: One foot, then the other. Push yourself to walk 50 km this month.
task: Walk a total of 50 km (31.1 mi) in a month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June 400-Minute Challenge
description: Can you log 400 minutes this month?
task: Complete 400 minutes of activity in a month – any sport counts.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: June Ten Days Active Challenge
description: Can you set aside 10 minutes to be active for 10 days this month?
task: Do 10 minutes of activity for 10 days this month.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: Fizik Leadout
description: Join the Leadout to earn rewards and win prizes from fizik and friends.
reward: Roll off roads to earn rewards and win big with fizik, Factor, Rapha, Tailfin, Wahoo, Buff—and Team Amani.

name: Run with Audible: Great Ocean Road

name: Objective Tour de France with Jules

task: Complete 10 days active in a month
reward: Zdobądź odznakę, wygraj zegarki Garmin, kaski Abusa, opony Continental i skrzyyydła!

name: Brooks Venice: Let's Run There
description: Let's Run There with Brooks
reward: Complete the segment and earn a digital badge for your trophy case.

name: Brooks NYC: Let's Run There
description: Let's Run There with Brooks
reward: Complete the segment and earn a digital badge for your trophy case.

name: Brooks Trailhead: Let's Run There
description: Most segment completions for the month wins head-to-toe gear from Brooks
reward: Complete the most segment attempts and win head-to-toe Brooks gear from the Seattle flagship store.

name: Reach Beyond with Science in Sport
description: Complete 12 active days over 3 weeks for the chance to win prizes
reward: Unlock 15% reward \u0026 your chance to win an exclusive trip to create your own Energy Gel along with other SiS prizes

name: Do the Work with BetterHelp
description: Show up for men's mental health and get a week of free therapy!
task: Do 15 minutes of activity for 10 days.
reward: Complete this challenge and earn one free week of online therapy through BetterHelp!

name: Experience A New High: Altra x Sloan's
description: Get loopy around the lake to unlock a limited-edition Altra badge.
reward: Crush this segment (or all 5) and earn an Altra badge for your Trophy Case.

name: Experience A New High: Altra x Platte
description: Pass the high-flying Elitch coasters &amp; follow the river to get your badge.
task: Run the Altra x Platte segment
reward: Crush this segment (or all 5) and earn an Altra badge for your Trophy Case.

name: Rivian Summer Recharge Challenge
description: Log 15 hours of outdoor activity for a special badge and a chance to win.
reward: Log 15 hours of outdoor activity and score a special Strava badge — and a chance to win a real Rivian adventure.

name: BOOST Belfast Segment
description: Pushing through to the finish line? There's a BOOST for that!
task: Take on the segment challenge, and earn a year's supply of BOOST and merch
reward: You've unlocked a shot at winning a year's supply of BOOST Sport and branded merch!

name: BOOST London Segment
description: Pushing through to the finish line? There's a BOOST for that!
task: Take on the segment challenge, and earn a year's supply of BOOST and merch
reward: You've unlocked a shot at winning a year's supply of BOOST Sport and branded merch!

name: Le Col Million Strong Challenge
description: Record 240 minutes of activity for a chance to win a £50/$60 Le Col reward
reward: Record 240 minutes of activity for a £50 Le Col reward \u0026 a chance to win 1 of 3 £300 vouchers to use at LeCol.cc

name: Shimano Super Cycling Sunday
description: Complete the challenge for a chance to win 4 VIP Tour de France tickets!
task: Ride a total of 50km (30 miles) in a week
reward: Complete the challenge for a chance to win 4 VIP tickets to the Tour de France or 1 of 2 ULTEGRA C50 wheelsets!

name: Green Chef Move 200 Challenge!
description: Move for 200 minutes and receive a special discount from Green Chef!
reward: Complete 200 minutes of movement \u0026 get rewarded with delicious and nutritious meals from Green Chef. Are you ready?

name: The BOOST Sport 5K
description: Pushing through to the finish line? There's a BOOST for that!
reward: You've unlocked a shot at winning a year's supply of BOOST Sport and branded merch!

name: Shokz: Global Running Day Challenge
description: Log your daily run to help us complete 42.195 laps around the Earth!
task: Complete 5 km of running or walking
reward: Log your daily run to help us complete 42.195 laps around the Earth and get a chance to win headphones from Shokz!

name: It’s Personal 5K Challenge with Puresport
description: Earn £25 off and a chance to win the PB Performance Bundle
reward: Earn £25 off and a chance to win 1 of 1500 exclusive Race Day bundles or 1 of 50 PB Performance Bundles

name: SunGod: No Better Time
description: Log 50 minutes of outdoor time to unlock a 20% reward at SunGod.co.
time: Jun 14, 2025 to Jun 22, 2025  —  1 day until start
reward: Completers get a reward for use at SunGod.co, plus a chance to win a £3000 SunGod bundle for you and ten friends.

name: World Bicycle Relief's Pedal to Empower
description: Riding 1M km to empower women &amp; girls with bikes! Sponsored by Backroads
reward: Earn a Pedal to Empower badge and a chance to win an exclusive Cuore World Bicycle Relief jersey.

name: Get Sponsored By The Feed
description: Complete the challenge and earn $60 Feed Cash to fuel your training.
reward: Complete the challenge, and unlock a sponsorship from The Feed with $60 of annual credit to spend on nutrition

name: Smoothie King X TCS NYC Bib Giveaway
description: Win an opportunity for a bib to the TCS New York City Marathon!
task: Run a total of 26.2 miles this month
reward: Run 26.2 miles this month to receive a free 20 oz smoothie and enter for a TCS NYC Marathon bib!

name: Omius Cool Summer Challenge
description: Kick off summer training &amp; earn a discount on Omius cooling technology
reward: Earn a 20% discount to Omius and be eligible to enter a drawing to win Omius product and race fee coverage.

name: Train with Turkey
description: Get training to earn your badge. Fuel with turkey. You train. You turkey.
reward: Earn a digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: adidas adizero: Train to be your fastest.
description: How fast can I be?
reward: Complete the challenge and earn the adizero finisher's badge for your Trophy Case!

name: Gatorade RUN10
description: Run 10 km and join the Gatorade community. #IsItInYou?
reward: Complete the challenge and earn the Gatorade finisher's badge for your Trophy Case!

name: Eight Sleep Training Duo Challenge
description: Invite a friend &amp; log 8km/5mi to be one of the first to try the new Pod 5
reward: Earn up to $350 off eightsleep.com, unlock the digital badge and enter for the chance to win the new Pod 5

name: Oboz Footwear: LOVE HIKING Challenge
description: Hike 20 miles to win a prize from Oboz Footwear and a Love Hiking badge.
reward: Complete the challenge for 30% off at obozfootwear.com \u0026 shop new styles like the light and fast Katabatic LT!

name: Blocks League - BNF Speed Zone
description: Fais ton meilleur temps sur cette Speed Zone Blocks league de 500m !
task: Dépasse toi sur ce segment de 500m !
reward: Tente de gagner des produits exclusifs et ton badge Blocks League - BNF Speed Zone !

name: Breeze Airways Get Going Challenge
description: Log 220 minutes of activity this month in honor of Global Wellness Day
time: Jun 14, 2025 to Jul 12, 2025  —  1 day until start
reward: Complete 220 minutes of activity for a chance to win free flights on Breeze for a year.

name: Creemore Explore Your Backyard Challenge
description: Log 1,987 activity minutes in 2 months for a chance to win a getaway!
reward: Log 1,987 minutes in 2 months for the chance to win a two-night's stay at the Creemore Cottage!

name: Don't Buy Nuun, Earn It Challenge
description: Log 200 minutes of activity for two consecutive weeks to earn 30% off Nuun!
task: Complete 400 minutes of activity over 2 weeks.
reward: You’ll get 30% off Nuun Hydration plus an exclusive badge.

name: Hyundai x adidas 10k Paris: Run to Progress
description: Ready. Set. Run to progress.
reward: Complete the Hyundai segment for a chance to win 2 bibs to Run In Lyon and earn a digital \"Run to progress\" badge!

name: TOUR DE FRANCE with ibis budget
description: Log 200 minutes of activity and try to win a VIP day at the Tour De France
reward: Log 200 minutes of activities and try to win a VIP day on the TOUR DE FRANCE with ibis budget

name: Sweat with Pride Challenge
description: Movement is the bridge that connects us all this Pride Month
reward: Earn the coveted annual Pride digital finisher's badge for your Trophy Case.

name: Experience A New High: Altra x Wash Park
description: Crush this Wash Park route and earn an exclusive Altra badge.
time: Jun 15, 2025 to Aug 9, 2025  —  2 days until start
task: Run the Altra x City Park segment
reward: Crush this segment (or all 5) and earn an Altra badge for your Trophy Case.

name: On the Trail of the Tour by Decathlon
description: The Strava Challenge by Decathlon – win a trip to the Tour de France
time: Jun 14, 2025 to Jul 6, 2025  —  1 day until start
task: Complete 170 km in 3 weeks on the bike
reward: Be there at the Tour de France finale and secure more top prizes. Every finisher wins!

name: UCAN Endurance 10 Challenge
description: Run 10 miles at once or split it up. However you do it, it counts.
time: Jun 14, 2025 to Jun 29, 2025  —  1 day until start
reward: Run 10 miles to unlock your FREE UCAN Sample Pack + 25% off at ucan.co and enter to win $500 of FREE UCAN.

name: Outdoorvision Run Challenge
description: Run to protect your practice spaces and get the chance to win !
time: Jun 14, 2025 to Jun 20, 2025  —  1 day until start
reward: Complete the challenge and try to win a Suunto bone conduction headset or topoguides of the FFRando
